name: Wild Caboose Chase
description:
There are a quite a few too many crooks, robbers, thieves, thugs, bandits, and otherwise all-around ne'er-do-wells on this locomotive! Get them out of there! If too many occupy a single car, you lose. But beware, as the game progresses more cars will be *joined together* which means more enemies and more to manage.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021

by Jackson Neu, Drew Shapiro and Alex Junquera (BOKiKiSOFT)

Music composed by Evan Neu
